ADD_LIBRARY(GraphicalUtils 
  ProgressBar.cpp
  PropertiesModel.cpp
  PropertiesWidget.cpp
  TreeStructure.cpp
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GraphicalUtils PRIVATE 
  ${VTK_LIBRARIES}
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Widgets
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::OpenGLWidgets 
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Gui
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Xml
  Defaults
  Widgets
  Utils
)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(GraphicalUtils PUBLIC
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface/GraphicalUtils
)

# Autogenerated uic files
if(WIN32)
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(GraphicalUtils INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/GraphicalUtils_autogen/include_Release
  )
else()
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(GraphicalUtils INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/GraphicalUtils_autogen/include
  )
endif()
